attributes.action: remove cheesy looking images of him from the number 10 website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: self-explanatory really isnt it, he's sickening enough without those images

rejection.details: If you have questions or comments about the Number 10 site, please contact the web team at admin@number10.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
